name: Cyberwalk 2049
description:
Introduction

Year 2049, the world is falling into decline year by year. The AI has achieved consciousness resulting in a worldwide collapse. You, a self conscious robot, will need to smuggle robotic parts and upgrades to face the threads ahead and survive.

Instructions

Defend yourself from the sentinel robots using the robotic improvements you find in your path and advance as far as you can.

Controls
  • Move your character with A and D
  • Use SPACE to Jump
  • Hold S to get off the platforms Use Left Mouse Click for shoot and Hold Left Mouse Click to pick up the boxes
